name: crypto-treasury-companies
description: Real-time monitoring of crypto treasury companies market cap and MNAV premium

scripts.start: node -e "const http=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const server=http.createServer((req,res)=>{const filePath=path.join(process.cwd(),req.url==='/'?'index.html':req.url);fs.readFile(filePath,(err,data)=>{if(err){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not Found');return;}const ext=path.extname(filePath);const mimeTypes={'.html':'text/html','.js':'application/javascript','.css':'text/css','.csv':'text/csv'};res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':mimeTypes[ext]||'text/plain'});res.end(data);});});server.listen(8000,()=>console.log('ðŸŒŸ Server running at http://localhost:8000'))"
scripts.preview:simple: echo 'Starting simple Node.js server at http://localhost:8080...' && node -e "require('http').createServer((req,res)=>{const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const filePath=path.join(process.cwd(),req.url==='/'?'index.html':req.url);fs.readFile(filePath,(err,data)=>{if(err){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not Found');return;}res.writeHead(200);res.end(data);});}).listen(8080,()=>console.log('Server running at http://localhost:8080'))"
scripts.validate: node -e "console.log('Validating project structure...'); const fs=require('fs'); const files=['index.html','script.js','db/MNAV.csv']; const missing=files.filter(f=>!fs.existsSync(f)); if(missing.length){console.error('Missing:',missing);process.exit(1);}console.log('âœ… All files found');"
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm start - Start dev server on port 8000 (Node.js)
  npm run preview - Smart preview with auto-open browser
  npm run preview:simple - Simple Node.js server
  npm run validate - Check project structure'
